titleStmt.title: The ioy of Ierusalem and woe of the worldlings. A sermon preached at Pauls Crosse the 18. of Iune. 1609. By William Loe Batcheler of Diuinity.
titleStmt.author: Loe, William, d. 1645.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by T. Haueland for C. Knight and I. Harrison, and are to be sold [by C. Knight] in Pauls Church-yard at the signe of the holy Lambe,

notesStmt.note: A variant; includes "and prebendarie of the Cathedrall Church of Glocester" following "Batcheler of Diuinity" in title, and 2 leaves ([par.1,2] of dedication after leaf A1.
Identified as STC 16685c on UMI microfilm reel 673.
Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
Appears at reel 673 þ, and at reel 844 #5 (Folger Shakespeare Library copy filmed twice).
